street_name: to the South by Wyke Road and to the west by Wansbeck Road
description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) to vary Condition 2 (Temporary Building) pursuant to planning permission 16/00647/FUL for the erection of a temporary two storey management and marketing suite (sui generis use) to provide flexible space for sales, exhibitions, offices, storage and events in connection with the marketing of residential development at Neptune Wharf, together with hard and soft landscaping and ancillary works.
decision_conditions:
The building hereby permitted shall not be retained after 31st October 2020 on or before which date the building shall be removed from the site and the land shall be reinstated in accordance with the landscaping details as approved under planning permission 16/00219/REM.  

Reason: The building is for a temporary use only and the approved landscaping reserved matters for this phase of the development (16/00219/REM) are required to be implemented in full to provide an acceptable standard of landscaping in Phases 1 and 1 of the Neptune Wharf development.
